item.title: Making A Website With RStudio: The Blogdown Package
item.description: Welcome to the first post of my blogdown blog! Although I started writing this post in November 2019, it’s still been in the drafts as of currently April 2020 😅. I figured the debut post would be best dedicated to sharing my personal experience of using this package as an R user with little to no background in web development. Before starting a page, it’s helpful to have some idea of the difference between static websites vs.
